text: Eva Miriam Hart (January 31, 1905 â€“ February 14, 1996) was an RMS Titanic survivor. She was seven years old when she and her parents, Benjamin and Esther, boarded Titanic. Hart was sleeping when the Titanic hit an iceberg at 11:40 PM. Hart and her mother were picked up by RMS Carpathia after going on their Lifeboats. Hart was born in Ilford, Essex, England. She died in Chadwell Heath, London, two weeks after her 91st birthday. Category:People from Essex Category:RMS Titanic survivors Category:1905 births Category:1996 deaths
title: Eva Hart
